title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1731/92 of 30 June 1992 fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 2013/91
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1731/92  of 30 June 1992  fixing the weighting coefficients to be used in calculating the Community market price for pig carcases and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 2013/91
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The weighting coefficients referred to in Article 4 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2759/75 shall be as specified in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1992.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1992.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
